Title: Islands: Part Two
Writer: David Shore (developed by), Jae-Beom Park (based on the Korean Broadcasting System television series by), Thomas L. Moran, William L. Rotko, Johanna Lee (executive story editor), David Renaud (story editor), Karen Struck (story editor), Lloyd Gilyard Jr. (staff writer)
Actors: Freddie Highmore, Nicholas Gonzalez, Antonia Thomas, Chuku Modu
Plot: The twins suffer complications from their surgery forcing the team at San Jose Boneventure Hospital to make a life-changing decision. Meanwhile, Dr. Shaun Murphy returns to the hospital ...
